abstract: The investment bank’s former chief executive will take no executive role, but will focus on partnership matters and strategy.
snippet: The investment bank’s former chief executive will take no executive role, but will focus on partnership matters and strategy.
lead_paragraph: RIO de JANEIRO — André Esteves has rejoined the investment bank BTG Pactual as an adviser, a significant step toward a full return to finance after he was arrested and jailed less than six months ago as part of a corruption scandal that has shaken Brazil’s political and business elite.

headline.main: André Esteves, Freed From Jail, Returns to BTG Pactual
